newsitem.title: SPAIN: Vitoria airport August cargo volumes nearly double.
newsitem.headline: Vitoria airport August cargo volumes nearly double.

text.p: Cargo traffic at Vitoria airport in northern Spain rose to 1,506 tonnes in August, from 774 tonnes in August 1995, airport figures show.
This takes cargo volumes so far this year to 14,596 tonnes, compared with 6,147 in the same period last year.
Traffic has been growing at more than 100 percent most months this year and the airport in July forecast an year end total of around 30,000 tonnes compared with 13,782 in 1995.

International charter flights accounted for 935 tonnes of the August total, followed by intra European Community flights, with 367 tonnes and domestic scheduled flights which accounted for 204 tonnes.
